name: After Midnight (beta!)
description:
A tiny tactical RPG where you lead a team of animal medics that are trying to contain a virus outbreak in a hospital. Sounds like another day at the job... except that the bacteria are way, way bigger than they expected.

Current build (17/09/2020) contains 5 chapters out of planned 11, and is missing certain key features (audio, more art, Polish language support, etc.) but is entirely playable from start to finish. We'll be improving this build as we go.

The full version of this game will be released for free on October 13th 2020, here on itch.io!

For more of our stuff, be sure to check out http://afterburn.games/

The game was partially funded with help from the National Centre for Culture Poland.
